content.no:
Analog subbass-lydbibliotek for DecentSampler med triangelbølgeoscillator fra en [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) sent gjennom forskjellige forvrengningskretser og effekter. All lyd i videoen er fra en enkelt instans av plugin'en.
Instrument presets: SubC som er en preset med mono-lydfiler og SubC (Stereo) som er en preset med stereo-lydfiler.
Dynamics: Bestemmer om anslaget skal påvirke volumet og forvrengningen.
Saturation: Saturation-knotten mikser mellom rent signal og forvrengt signal. De rene lydene er tatt opp med en Roland PA-120 mikser. De forvrengte lydene er i tillegg sent gjennom en [Hairball Audio FET/RACK (1176 kompressor)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/) og en transformator- og diodevreng. Stereolydene er de samme som monolydene, men sendt gjennom en [TC Electronic SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/) i vibratomodus. Dette gir en mye bredere lyd, men med mindre bunn når den summeres til mono.
Envelope: Form lyden din nøyaktig med parametrene Attack, Decay, Sustain og Release. Enten du ønsker en punchy, staccato-tone eller en jevn, dvelende atmosfære, lar ADSR-envelope'n deg skreddersy dynamikken etter din smak.
Utstyr som er brukt: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), Roland PA-120, [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Alex Franklinos Stereo Transformer Saturator](equipment/effects/alex-franklinos-stereo-transformer-saturator/) og [TC Electronic SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/).
Teknisk spesifikasjon for mono-lydfiler: Samplingsfrekvens: 48 kHz, bitdybde: 24 bit, kanaler: 1 (mono), antall lydfiler: 108 og filstørrelse: 327.30 MB.
Teknisk spesifikasjon for stereo-lydfiler: Samplingsfrekvens: 48 kHz, bitdybde: 24 bit, kanaler: 2 (stereo), antall lydfiler: 108 og filstørrelse: 654.20 MB.
content.en:
Analog sub bass sample library for DecentSampler featuring a [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) triangle wave oscillator ran through different saturation circuits and effects. All the sounds in the video are from a single instance of the plugin with no additional plugins or effects added.
Instrument presets: SubC which is a preset with mono samples and SubC (Stereo) which is a preset with stereo samples.
Dynamics: Determines whether the velocity should affect the volume and distortion.
Saturation: The saturation knob blends between the clean samples and the distorted samples. The clean samples are recorded through a Roland PA-120 mixer. The distorted/saturated samples are additionally sent through a [Hairball Audio FET/RACK (1176 compressor)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/) and a transformer and diode saturator. The stereo samples are the same as the mono samples, but sent through a [TC Electronic SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/) in vibrato mode. This gives a much wider sound, but less bottom end when summed to mono.
Envelope: Shape your sound precisely with the Attack, Decay, Sustain, and Release parameters. Whether you desire a punchy, staccato tone or a smooth, lingering ambiance, the ADSR envelope allows you to tailor the dynamics to your liking.
Equipment used: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), Roland PA-120, [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Alex Franklinos Stereo Transformer Saturator](equipment/effects/alex-franklinos-stereo-transformer-saturator/) and [TC Electronic SCF Stereo Chorus Flanger](equipment/effects/tc-electronic-scf-stereo-chorus-flanger/).
Technical specification for mono samples: Sample rate: 48 kHz, bit depth: 24 bit, channels: 1 (mono), number of files: 108 and file size: 327.30 MB.
Technical specification for  stereo samples: Sample rate: 48 kHz, bit depth: 24 bit, channels: 2 (stereo), number of files: 108 and file size: 654.20 MB.

thumbnailDescription: SubC user interface inside a wooden synthesizer case

title.no: Ny oppdatert Omni-84 med AutoStrum preset
title.en: New updated Omni-84 with AutoStrum preset

content.no:
En ny oppdatert versjon av [Omnichord-biblioteket (Omni-84)](products/omni-84/) har støtte for automatisk "strumming" med mønstre fra en [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/).

Tonene blir spilt av i samme rekkefølge som den originalen [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/), men du har muligheten til å få de spilt av i vanlig stigende/synkende rekkefølge også..  
Biblioteket inneholder mønstre for alle de individuelle akkordene til en [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/).
Den har de samme tangentverdiene som [Omni-84](products/omni-84/) 'Chords'-preset'en, som betyr at du kan sende MIDI til begge på likt å få en klimpret 'SonicStrings' sammen med akkordlyden fra 'Chords'-preset'en.
AutoStrum (speed): Rask fart vil låte som en akkord mens langsom fart vill låte som enkelttoner.
Strum-mønster: Velg mellom stigende/synkende toner og vanlig/[Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) rekkefølge.
Modulasjonshjul: Kontrollerer AutoStrum (speed).
Tangentbindinger: C0 er stigende toner i [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) rekkefølge, D0 er synkende toner i [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) rekkefølge, E0 er stigende toner i vanlig rekkefølge og F0 er synkende toner i vanlig rekkefølge.
De andre kontrollerene er de samme som i standard "SonicStrings" preset'en.
De andre tangentbindingene er de samme som i "Chords" preset'en.
content.en:
A new updated version of the [Omnichord library (Omni-84)](products/omni-84/) featuring support for automatic strumming of strum patterns from the [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/).
The notes are strummed in the same order as the original [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/), but you have the possibility to make it strum in regular ascending/descending order as well.
The preset contains strum patterns for all the individual chords from the [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/).
It has the same notes values for the chords as the [Omni-84](products/omni-84/) 'Chords' preset, which means you can send MIDI to both at the same time and get strummed SonicStrings on top of the chord sample.
AutoStrum (speed): Fast strum speed will sound like a chord and slow strum speed will sound like plucked notes.
Strum pattern: Select between ascending/descending notes and regular/[Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) order.
Modulation Wheel: Controls the AutoStrum (speed).
Key bindings: C0 is ascending notes in [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) order, D0 is descending notes in [Omnichord](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) order, E0 is ascending notes in regular order and F0 is descending notes in regular order.
Other controls are the same as on the regular "SonicStrings" preset.
Other key bindings are the same as on the "Chords" preset.

thumbnailDescription: Graphical user interface of the Omni-84 with the AutoStrum section highlighted

content.no:
Kjapp demo av [4-track Toy Piano](products/4-track-toy-piano/) biblioteket for Decent Sampler.
[4-track Toy Piano](products/4-track-toy-piano/) er et [Kalikå Leksakspiano (toy piano)](equipment/instruments/kalikaa-leksakspiano/) tatt opp på kassett og spilt av med halv fart og vanlig/original fart. Avspilling med halv fart resulterer i en oktav lavere tonehøyde.
content.en:
Quick demo of the [4-track Toy Piano](products/4-track-toy-piano/) sample library for Decent Sampler.
[4-track Toy Piano](products/4-track-toy-piano/) is a [Kalikå Leksakspiano (toy piano)](equipment/instruments/kalikaa-leksakspiano/) recorded on to cassette tape and played back at half speed and normal/original speed. Playing back at half speed results in an octave lower pitch.

thumbnailDescription: Screenshot of the GUI for 4-track Toy Piano and a Kalikå Leksakspiano
